Tarti:
Would you like to know about Ertheria training.
Pantheon and Navari thought long and hard about different ways to protect the Talking Island Village and Faeron from possible attacks. Finally, they came up with a new way to train in a safe space.
I've been told to help you with your training!
That's it! Training requires a lot of preparation... Do you have any Soulshots? I'll give you some if you don't.
I have everything we might need. Take it and then we'll talk.
